department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: The World of Romance Language Cinemas: A Classical Age
course.meeting_text: Tu., 1–3, and a weekly film screening M., 1-3
course.description: Studies early and classical cinemas in France, Italy, and Spain through comparative and close analysis. Includes films by Renoir, Vigo, Melville; Rossellini, de Sica, Visconti; Bunuel, Garcia Berlanga, Erice.
course.prerequisites: An excellent reading knowledge of at least one Romance language.
